articles.title: Reports - Los Angeles Lakers, center Thomas Bryant agree to 1-year deal
articles.description: Thomas Bryant agreed to a one-year deal with the Los Angeles Lakers, according to multiple reports.
articles.content:
Free agent center Thomas Bryant has agreed to a one-year deal with the Los Angeles Lakers, according to multiple reports.

articles.title: Oklahoma City Thunder rookie Chet Holmgren dazzles in debut, sets Summer League record
articles.description: Thunder rookie Chet Holmgren scored 23 points, blocked six shots and hit four 3-pointers in a sterling Summer League debut on Tuesday night.
articles.content:
SALT LAKE CITY -- Oklahoma City Thunder rookie Chet Holmgren shined in his professional debut, scoring 23 points and setting a Summer League record for blocks and 3s in a game.

articles.title: Max Scherzer strikes out 11, doesn't surrender a run in return to New York Mets
articles.description: Max Scherzer struck out 11 in six scoreless innings against the Reds on Tuesday night, leaving after 79 pitches and showing no issues with his speed or control.

articles.title: Los Angeles Dodgers OF Chris Taylor out with left foot fracture
articles.description: Dodgers outfielder Chris Taylor has a left foot fracture and will be out indefinitely.
articles.content:
Los Angeles Dodgers versatile outfielder Chris Taylor has a left foot fracture and will be sidelined indefinitely, he told reporters on Tuesday.

articles.description: Four fans attending a postgame July 4 fireworks show were struck by bullet fragments from what police said appeared to be "celebratory gunfire" outside the Coliseum.
articles.content:
OAKLAND, Calif. -- Four baseball fans were injured by bullet fragments from outside the Coliseum while attending a postgame July 4 fireworks show, Oakland police and the Athletics said Tuesday.

articles.description: Brittney Griner's appeal in a handwritten letter has been read by President Joe Biden, officials said on Tuesday, as the WNBA All-Star is in the midst of a trial in Russia that began last week after she was arrested Feb. 17.
